nodes.text: The flying leaf was a giant magical leaf that was invented by the Leaf Queen to take the Ewok shaman Logray to a meeting with the Coalition of the Freezing.
However, Logray disappeared in a snowstorm, and the young Ewok Wicket convinced his friends Princess Kneesaa, Teebo and Latara to go in Logray's stead, given the direness of the situation.
